projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: The website you're currently on. This project was built using Gatsby and was my first time utilizing gatsby as I wanted to challenge myself using a framework I wasn't familiar with to create my portfolio. Some challenges I faced were data manipulation so I could dynamically load images when developing this project section.

projects.title: REST Countries API
projects.description: Frontend Mentor challenge utilizing TypeScript and React grabbing country data through the https://restcountries.com/ RESTful API with togglable light/dark mode.

projects.title: Random Quote Machine
projects.description: This project was for a freeCodeCamp front-end development certificate. I wanted to use jQuery to apply what I learned in one of my projects. One challenge I faced was getting ajax to work properly, as the documentation wasn't so easy to go through.

aboutMeText: Hi, I'm Blair! I've been coding since I was 13, starting with Lua on the Roblox game engine, creating games for my friends, others, and myself. I am a self-taught developer and have learned by doing and through other learning mediums such as youtube, official documentation and developer forums. I love spending time fixing little details and solving complex problems. Currently, I've been working with React and GraphQL in Gatsby, but I'm always excited to learn new technologies!
